name: Markus Endler
content: Markus Endler home page Markus Endler Associate Professor Dr. rer. nat. - Technical University Berlin, 1992 Prof. livre-docente - University of São Paulo, 2001 Head of the Research Area: Distributed and Mobile Systems Primary Research Interests: Pervasive and Mobile Computing Middleware for Context- and Location-awareness Internet of Mobile Things Distributed Algorithms and Protocols Coordination in mobile swarms Teaching · Publications · Students · Academic Hints · Talks · Activities · CV · News · Personal Departamento de Informática, PUC Rio Rua Marques de São Vicente 225, Gávea Tel: (21) 3527.1500 X4309 (office) Fax: (21) 3527.1530 endler_AT_inf.puc-rio.br linkedin.com/in/markus-endler-3192361 Member of the SBC, ACM and IFIP WG 6.1 Co-Program Chair of
